title: Software is Changing (Again) and Why Teens Need to Learn Vibe Coding
description: Andrej Karpathy, the creator of the term 'Vibe Coding,' explains how software development is fundamentally changing and why teens need to learn this new approach. Essential viewing for understanding the future of coding education and AI-powered development.
author: Andrej Karpathy

title: The Rise of Vibe Coding
description: Google Cloud's 2025 DORA report reveals that 90% of developers now use AI tools daily, dedicating a median of 2 hours per day collaborating with AI assistants. This represents a fundamental shift in how software is created, with developers becoming orchestrators of intelligent systems rather than just code writers.
author: Maria Urot

title: The Vibe Coding Advantage: Alexandr Wang's Powerful Advice for the Next Generation
description: Alexandr Wang, founder of Scale AI, shares powerful insights about the future of coding and how the next generation can leverage AI tools to build amazing things. Essential viewing for students and parents interested in the future of technology education.
author: Alvin Foo
